CurrentIssues.ID: TopLevelPropertyNaming:PullRefreshIndicator.kt$// Values taken from SwipeRefreshLayout private const val MinAlpha = 0.3f

TopLevelPropertyNaming:PullRefreshState.kt$/** * The distance pulled is multiplied by this value to give us the adjusted distance pulled, which * is used in calculating the indicator position (when the adjusted distance pulled is less than * the refresh threshold, it is the indicator position, otherwise the indicator position is * derived from the progress). */ private const val DragMultiplier = 0.5f
